nodes.text: Mantorr was a non-sentient species native to the shadow world of Umbara. The species stood on two legs and had single sharp claws as front limbs. They had spikes along their back and a large horn atop their noses. Mantorrs spotted different colors and varied in size, from the small mantorin to individuals large enough to ride as mounts. The Commander and Lana Beniko killed several mantorrs during the events of the Crisis on Umbara.

Mantorrs were added to Star Wars: The Old Republic with patch 5.4 that introduced Umbara to the game. Besides appearing as enemies during the "Crisis on Umbara" flashpoint, Mantorr pet and mount were also made available from a Cartel Market pack.
